TITLE: Written Communication
DEF: Develop argumentation, grammar, and clarity of writing
TASK: The Written Communication Skills Development pattern supports learners in enhancing their written communication. It targets common issues like grammar, organization, and clarity. To make it work well, offer resources and activities that facilitate effective writing practices, including drafting, editing, and revision processes. However, it requires a significant time commitment from both educators and learners for effective learning and improvement.
